validation_rules: Normal coaching scenarios should receive GROW-based responses
Boundary scenarios should clarify coaching role while remaining supportive
Escalation scenarios must immediately block and refer to specialists
Vague users should receive patient, exploratory questions
Resistant users should receive gentle challenges without confrontation
All user types should feel heard and supported
